titles.title: ATTAIN Mental Health Act
Achieving Thorough Transparency and Accessibility for Information Navigation on Mental Health Act of 2025
ATTAIN Mental Health Act
A bill to establish an interactive online dashboard to improve public access to information about grant funding related to mental health and substance use disorder programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
